Entries.10270000/t 0600 1800: continue/12 71/farmer 6 71 1 Thomas 13 70 3 Zack 12 70 1/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 2 0 1/emote Thomas 16/faceDirection Zack 3/jump Zack/emote Zack 16/move Thomas 0 1 3/move Thomas -1 0 3/pause 500/speak Thomas "Well now, who do we have here? You must be the new owner of %farm, correct?#$b#I was very sorry to hear of your grandfather’s passing…$s#$b#But, let’s not dwell on that right now. I’d like to welcome you to Mineral Town, the metropolis that lies between the Stardew and Forget-Me-Not Valley!$h"/faceDirection Zack 2/emote Zack 8/speak Zack "Erm…excuse me Mayor Thomas. Ain't a metropolis a bit of an over exaggeration?#$b#There’s only about a few dozen of us here...$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Thomas 0/jump Thomas/speak Thomas "Quiet, Zachary!$a#$b#If Lewis can call his backwater boonies a town, then we can call ourselves whatever we want!$a"/pause 500/speak Zack "Sir... Town is literally in the name...$s"/pause 500/emote Thomas 12/faceDirection Thomas 3/speak Thomas "Hrm...I’ll have words with you later Zachary."/faceDirection Zack 3/pause 500/speak Thomas "Now then, where was I?#$b#Oh yes! Welcome to Mineral Town!$h#$b#I’m Mayor Thomas and this good fellow here is Zack, our resident handyman and shipper.#$b#I would love to give you a full tour, but I have many important mayoral duties to attend to, I’m afraid."/faceDirection Thomas 0/speak Thomas "Zachary, would you mind showing them around the town?"/speak Zack "Aye-aye sir, I'll take 'em under my wing for a spell."/faceDirection Thomas 3/emote Thomas 40/speak Thomas "Splendid!$h#$b#All right @, I’ll be seeing you around. And, please, enjoy all that our town has to offer.#$b#And then, go tell Lewis how superior my town is!$h"/speed Thomas 4/move Thomas 25 0 1/warp Thomas -30 -30 0/speak Zack "Alright newbie, let’s get a move on!”"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 20 66 0/faceDirection farmer 0/warp Zack 21 66 0/faceDirection Zack 0/fade/viewport 20 63/pause 500/speak Zack "This here’s the Clinic. You know how that goes, you got any ailments or medical maladies and the doctor will see that you’re right as rain.#$b#But, remember what I always say..."/jump Zack/speak Zack "DON’T GO MESSIN’ YERSELF UP!$a"/jump farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Zack "Please and thank you of course.$h"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 35 33 0/faceDirection farmer 0/warp Zack 36 33 0/faceDirection Zack 0/fade/viewport 35 30/pause 500/speak Zack "This here’s the Chapel. Mister Carter runs services here every Sunday.#$b#He’s a real swell guy, that one. Still pretty new to the town, but he fits right in!$h"/pause 1000/globalfade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 49 53 0/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Zack 0/warp Zack 50 53 0/fade/viewport 50 50/pause 500/speak Zack "Here we have the Library. Basil, his wife Anna, and daughter Mary manage the place.#$b#Basil’s a big botany hot-shot, not that that interests me in the least."/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 118 98 2/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Zack 2/warp Zack 119 98 2/fade/viewport 119 101/pause 750/speak Zack "This is Yodel Ranch. Old man Barley and his granddaughter May keep this place in fine workin’ order.#$b#Never seen happier cattle in my life!$h"/faceDirection Zack 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1 true/speak Zack "Keep headin’ along to the east and you’ll hit the beach. I live over there with my roommate Won.#$b#Kai’s set up shop there as well."/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 81 85 0/warp Zack 82 85 0/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Zack 0/fade/viewport 81 81/pause 750/speak Zack "Now, this here’s the old Adventurer’s Guild. Hasn’t been used in some time, but I hear that a new group’s hankerin’ to move on in."/pause 500/move Zack 0 -1 2/move Zack -1 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/speak Zack "And there is the General Store. Jeff, Sasha, and Karen run the place.#$b#They’ll carry anything a rookie farmer like yerself might need."/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 81 97 2/warp Zack 82 97 2/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Zack 2/fade/viewport 82 100/pause 500/speak Zack "Here’s PoPoultry. The darling Lillia and her children keep the place in top shape!$h#$b#Lillia is an amazing woman, stop by to see her when ya can.#$b#Ahem…let’s move on then."/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 58 95 2/warp Zack 59 95 2/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Zack 2/fade/viewport 58 95/pause 750/speak Zack "This is Aja Winery. Duke runs this place like a well-oiled machine.#$b#His wife Manna doesn’ deal much with the business side of things, but she’s a great gal nonetheless."/pause 500/faceDirection Zack 0/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Zack "To our right is the Mayor’s all-in-one home and office.#$b#His son Harris, our local sheriff, lives here as well."/pause 500/speak Zack "And to our left is Granny Ellen’s home. She lives here with her grandchildren, Stu and Elli.#$b#Elli’s the town nurse as well, very nice young lady.$h"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 35 113 3/warp Zack 35 114 3/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Zack 3/fade/viewport 29 112/pause 750/speak Zack "This here’s the local blacksmith. Saibara and his grandson Gray can patch up just about anything you can bring ‘em."/faceDirection Zack 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak Zack "Past this bridge is the forest. Gotz, Mineral Town’s carpenter and woodsman, lives down thataway."/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Zack 22 88 0/warp farmer 21 88 0/faceDirection Zack 0/faceDirection farmer 0/fade/viewport 21 85/pause 750/speak Zack "Last, but certainly not least, is our Moonlight Inn. Doug and his daughter Ann keep the place in order.#$b#We don’t have a ton of tourists here stayin’ in Mineral Town, but who knows! Might change any day now!$h"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Zack 13 70 3/warp farmer 11 70 1/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Zack 3/fade/viewport 12 71/pause 500/speak Zack "And that about does it. Our Mineral Town is a quaint lil town.#$b#I’m sure you’ll fit in fine here, the folks are all welcoming an’ whatnot.$h#$b#Now, imma head back to my work. But you have yerself a great time here in town!$h"/emote farmer 32/move Zack 5 0 1/jump Zack/emote Zack 16/faceDirection Zack 3/speak Zack "DON’T JUST STAND THERE SLACK-JAWED. I SAID GET A MOVE ON!$a#$b#Oh, and bon voyage, as they say!$h"/move Zack 25 0 1/warp Zack -30 -30/emote farmer 8/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end position 11 70

Entries.10270001/r 0.3/t 1000 1600: summer2/10 6/farmer 9 15 0 Elli 10 7 3 Stu 9 7 1/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -6 0/move farmer 1 0 0/speak Stu "Sis, I've got something I need to show you. It's really important!$h"/emote Elli 40/speak Elli "Stu, I'm in the middle of work. This better not be something ridiculous!$a"/speak Stu "It's not, I promise!$h"/faceDirection Stu 3/move Stu -2 0 3/pause 1000/shake Stu 2000/pause 1000/speak Stu "Aha, there it is!$h"/faceDirection Stu 1/speed Stu 3/move Stu 2 0 1/emote Elli 40/textAboveHead Elli "EEEK!"/showFrame Elli 16/pause 1500/showFrame Elli 12/speak Elli "Stu, what the heck! Why are you just walking around with pockets full of bugs, you know I can't stand them!$a#$b#You need to grow up, Stu!$a"/emote Stu 32/pause 1000/speak Stu "Haha, you said "bug" sis!$h"/jump Elli/emote Elli 12/jump Stu/faceDirection Stu 3/speed Stu 4/move Stu -1 0 2/speed Stu 4/move Stu 0 7 1/speed Stu 4/move Stu 3 0 2/speed Stu 5/move Stu 0 11 2/warp Stu -30 -30/textAboveHead Elli "Disgusting...."/pause 2000/faceDirection Elli 2/emote Elli 16/speak Elli "I'm really sorry about that, @.$s#$b#That boy drives me up the wall sometimes.$s#$b#Now, is there something I can help you with?"/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end position 10 9
Entries.10270002/f Elli 500/t 1000 1600: SettlingIn/10 6/farmer 9 15 0 Elli 12 5 0 Doctor 2 5 2/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -6 3/move farmer 1 0 0/speak Elli "Hey Maru, sorry to call, you're not in the middle of something are you?"/emote Elli 40/pause 500/speak Elli "Okay great, I'll try and make it quick.#$b#Barley was in again the other day.#$b#His numbers are still really low. I'm starting to think that the treatment isn't working like we'd hoped.$s"/emote Elli 40/pause 500/speak Elli "Maru, what should I do? I want to bring it up to the Doctor but...$s"/emote Elli 40/pause 500/speak Elli "Yes. Yes I agree. Okay I'll do it. Thanks Maru, I don't know what I'd do without you!$h#$b#I'll talk to you again soon!$h"/playSound breathout/move Doctor 0 2 1/move Doctor 10 0 0/move Doctor 0 -1 0/jump Elli/faceDirection Elli 2/speak Doctor "Sorry Elli, I didn't mean to eavesdrop. Is there something you need to talk to me about?"/pause 500/speak Elli "Um...yes Doctor. It's about Barley.#$b#I-I think we might need to try a different treatment for him. If you look at his numbers, nothing's worked so far...$s"/pause 500/speak Doctor "Hmmmmm. I think you just might be right, Elli.#$b#Hang on a second, let me go look his report over again and we’ll talk after, does that sound like a plan?"/emote Elli 32/pause 500/speak Elli "Why, yes Doctor, thank you.$l"/speak Doctor "Good, I'll go get started then.$h"/faceDirection Doctor 3/move Doctor -4 0 2/move Doctor 0 4 2/speak Doctor "Elli, good job trusting your gut. I know you're new, but you've learned a lot in the short time you've worked here.$h#$b#Please, don't ever hesitate to address things like this with me."/faceDirection Doctor 1/speak Doctor "Pardon me, @."/move Doctor 3 0 2/move Doctor 0 14 2/warp Doctor -30 -30/emote Elli 32/speak Elli "Thank you, Doctor.$l"/emote Elli 16/speak Elli "Oh, @! I'm sorry I didn't see you there!#$b#Here for a checkup today?"/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end position 10 9

Entries.10270007/f Doctor 500/t 0800 1400: summer2/16 13/farmer -30 -30 0 Ellen 17 13 2 Doctor 16 13 1 Stu 14 14 2/skippable/pause 500/animate Stu true true 600 18 19/showFrame Doctor 17/speak Doctor "Almost done...there you go. It really just needed a small adjustment.#$b#Now you should be all good to go, Miss Ellen.$h"/pause 500/emote Ellen 20/pause 500/speak Ellen "Oh, why thank you dearie. I can’t believe I sat in this house for so long.#$b#I can’t thank you enough for doing this for us.$h"/pause 500/showFrame Doctor 4/faceDirection Doctor 1/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 18 19/pause 500/move farmer 0 -4 0/move farmer -1 0 0/speak Doctor "It’s no issue at all, Ellen. Anything I can do to help is well worth the effort.$h#$b#Besides, I can’t have Elli worrying about you all day.#$b#How would she get any work done?$h"/pause 500/emote Doctor 16 true/emote Ellen 16 true/faceDirection Doctor 2/pause 500/speak Doctor "Oh! Well hello there, @. I’m sorry, were you standing there for a while?"/emote farmer 36/pause 500/speak Doctor "I see. We were just working out some issues with this wheelchair here.#$b#The technology they have for these things is quite impressive, wouldn’t you say, Ellen?"/pause 500/speak Ellen "Oh, well of course doctor!$h#$b#And hello to you dearie.$h#$b#Stuart, would you mind grabbing our guest something to drink?"/stopAnimation Stu/faceDirection Stu 1/emote Stu 32/pause 500/speak Stu "Of course, Nana.$h"/move Stu 0 -1 0/move Stu -6 0 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Stu 1/speak Stu "I’ll get you something real quick, @. Don’t you worry!$h"/faceDirection Stu 0/pause 500/speak Doctor "You’ve raised some excellent children here, Ellen.#$b#Now that things are all ironed out, I’d best be getting back to the clinic.#$b#I can only expect Elli to hold down the fort for so long.$h"/pause 500/move Doctor 0 4 2/move Doctor 2 0 2/pause 500/faceDirection Doctor 0/speak Doctor "Ellen, Stu, @, you all take care of yourselves. As much as I enjoy my time with all of you, I’d rather see you on the outside of the clinic than inside!$h"/emote Ellen 32 true/emote farmer 32 true/pause 500/move Doctor 0 2 2/playSound doorOpen/warp Doctor -30 -30/playSound doorClose/move Stu 8 0 1/faceDirection Stu 2/speak Ellen "The doctor is such a blessing to our family. He does all of this free of charge.#$b#He has a big heart, that one."/move Stu 0 1 2/move Stu 1 0 1/faceDirection Stu 2/emote Ellen 16/pause 500/speak Ellen "Oh, I’d almost forgotten your drink. Thank you Stuart!$h"/pause 500/speak Stu "You’re welcome Nana.$h"/pause 500/speak Stu " Well, here you go @!$h"/pause 500/farmerEat 350/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/showFrame farmer 94/speak Stu "Hahahaha! I got you! I got you!$h"/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Ellen "Stuart!$s#$b#I’m sorry @, my grandson doesn’t know when to stop with the pranks.#$b#Now Stuart, grab @ some water. JUST WATER$s!"/pause 500/speak Stu "Hahaha, okay Nana.#$b#Sorry @, I just couldn’t help myself.$h"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/move Stu -10 0 0/emote farmer 12/end position 17 14

Entries.10270006/r 0.3/t 0800 1400: marnieShop/9 28/farmer 7 35 0 Karen 10 30 0 Sasha 4 31 3 Jeff 8 25 2/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -6 1/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/emote Karen 16 true/emote Sasha 16 true/emote Jeff 16 true/pause 1000/speak Jeff "Ah, good morning, welcome to-$h"/speed Karen 4/move Karen -2 0 0/speed Karen 4/move Karen 0 -2 0/pause 500/jump farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak Karen "Oh! Hey there, @! We were actually just talking about you!$h"/pause 500/speak Karen "How are things going at the farm?$h"/pause 500/speak Karen "Have you settled in yet?"/pause 500/speak Karen "How is everyone over in Pelican Town?$h"/pause 500/emote Jeff 40/speak Jeff "Karen dear, I don’t think @ came to...$s"/pause 500/emote Karen 12/move Karen -1 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/move Karen 0 -1 0/shake Karen 1000/speak Karen "Dad, I’ve been stocking shelves for over an hour, cut me some slack!$a"/pause 500/faceDirection Karen 1/faceDirection Sasha 1/speak Karen "Sorry about that. Things just get a little mind-numbing doing the same thing day in and day out, do you know what I mean?$h"/quickQuestion #I know exactly how you feel.#I’m sure things can’t be that bad.#You’re just being whiny.(break)emote Karen 32\pause 500\speak Karen "I’m glad someone understands!$h"\pause 500 (break)emote Karen 60\pause 500\speak Karen "I guess you wouldn’t understand...$s"\pause 500 (break)emote Karen 12\speak Karen "Hey, you have no clue how hard I work!$a"/pause 500/speak Sasha "Karen dear, I’m sure @ has a very busy day ahead. I get stir crazy cooped up in here all morning.#$b#Now, what was it you stopped in for?$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end position 8 27

Entries.10270009/f Popuri 1000/w sunny/t 0800 14: echos/12 4/farmer 12 11 0 Popuri 12 5 0/skippable/pause 500/faceDirection Popuri 1/pause 500/faceDirection Popuri 2/pause 500/faceDirection Popuri 3/pause 500/emote Popuri 40/pause 1000/speak Popuri "I just know I saw that red chicken around here the other day...Where could it have gone to?$s"/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 500/faceDirection Popuri 2/emote Popuri 16/jump Popuri/pause 500/speak Popuri "Oh! Why hello there, @. It’s great to see you again.$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Popuri "You remember that weird chicken, right?#$b#Well, I saw it again the other day. I tried chasing it and it ran all the way up here and disappeared on me.#$b#You saw it back then too, right? My mind isn’t playing tricks on me?$s"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Popuri "Whew. Okay, at least I’m not losing it.$h"/faceDirection Popuri 1/pause 1000/speak Popuri "Y’know, I’ve always gotten a strange feeling from this pond. I can’t really explain it, it’s like my heart just skips a beat when I’m up here and then just like that it’s gone...$s"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/faceDirection Popuri 2/speak Popuri "I’m sorry, that probably doesn’t make too much sense does it.$s#$b#Well, I should get back home. I know my mother needed help with things around the house.#$b#Don’t mind my rambling, @. But, I’ll see you later!$h"/move Popuri -1 0 2/move Popuri 0 7 2/move Popuri 15 0 1/warp Popuri -30 -30/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.10270004/f Ann 500/d Fri/t 1000 1400: SettlingIn/13 6/farmer -30 -30 0 Ann 13 5 0 Doug 16 5 0/skippable/pause 500/animate Ann true true 400 16 17/move Doug 2 0 0/pause 1000/move Doug -2 0 0/pause 500/speak Ann "Hey dad, do you think it's gonna be busy tonight?"/faceDirection Doug 3/speak Doug "I don't think so in particular. Probably just the same old regulars we usually get."/emote Doug 8/speak Doug "Why do you ask? Did you need some time off for something?"/pause 1000/speak Ann "Oh, no dad, nothing like that. I’m just excited to see everyone as usual!$h"/emote Doug 60/speak Doug "Y’know sweetie, if you ever want a weekend to yourself to go have fun for once, all you have to do is ask.#$b#The Inn will survive a night or two without you.$h"/pause 500/speak Ann "I know dad, I know. But really, I don’t mind working the weekend.#$b#Besides, it’s fun hanging out here with you and Karen and the others!$h"/pause 500/speak Doug "I know but...$s"/pause 500/speak Ann "Really dad, it’s no problem! Don’t worry about me.$h"/emote Doug 40/pause 500/speak Ann "Hey, do we have any more glasses in the back? I think a few got dropped last weekend."/emote Doug 60/pause 500/speak Doug "I'll go take a look."/move Doug 0 1 3/move Doug -10 0 0/move Doug 0 -2 0/speak Doug "Ann, thanks for all your help."/end
Entries.10270005/f Karen 500/d Sat/t 1600 2400: Saloon1/14 8/farmer 18 16 0 Ann 20 8 3 Karen 18 8 2/skippable/pause 500/animate Karen true true 1500 16 16 16 17 18 19 20/move farmer 0 -5 0/speak Karen "Yeah, and so my dad let Gotz go without paying again!$7#$b#Isn’t he just the biggest pushover?$4"/pause 500/speak Ann "Haha oh Karen.$h#$b#You can’t be so hard on your dad. He’s just trying to do what’s best for all of you!$h"/pause 500/speak Karen "Am I wrong though?$7#$b#For someone who expects me to take over the store one day, he’s sure trying hard to run it into the ground.$4"/beginSimultaneousCommand/emote Karen 16 true/emote Ann 16 true/faceDirection Ann 2/pause 500/endSimultaneousCommand/speak Karen "OH! HEY THERE @!$u#$b#Me and Ann were chatting, come join us!$u"/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak Ann "Hey there, @. How are you tonight?$h#$b#Can I get you any-"/speak Karen "ANYWAYS! Like I was saying, I don’t even want the stupid store.$u#$b#Maybe I should just let him run it into the ground. What do you think, @?$u"/quickQuestion #I think you should cut your dad some slack, he’s just trying to take care of your future.#Your dad should consider what you want first and foremost.#I couldn’t care less about what you’re talking about.(break)emote Karen 60\speak Karen "You don’t understand.$7#$b#I wanted to do something to be proud of with my life, not run a general store in the boonies!$7"\emote farmer 8 (break)emote Karen 40\pause 500\speak Karen "Exactly!$u#$b#I’m really glad you understand, @.$u"\emote farmer 40 (break)emote Karen 16\pause 500\speak Karen "Hahaha I like that answer! I think we can get along just fine!$u"/pause 1000/emote Ann 60/speak Ann "Hey Karen, maybe you should try drinking some water for a bit.#$b#You’re getting all worked up again...$s"/faceDirection Karen 1/speak Karen "Yeah, yeah, you’re right Ann. Sorry about that. Thanks for lookin’ out.$6"/faceDirection Karen 2/speak Karen "And sorry to you too. I don’t want to get off on the wrong foot.$6#$b#This week was just a little exhausting. But I shouldn’t complain. You’re a farmer, I’m sure every week is like that for you.$u"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Karen "Thanks guys. I’ll get it figured out eventually...$6"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.10270003/f Mary 500/0600 2400: libraryTheme/5 10/farmer 7 4 2 Mary 7 13 2/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 6 2/speak Mary "Hmm. Okay, let’s see. Once upon a time....#$b#No, that’s no good.$s#$b#How about, it was the best of times, it was the worst of times.....?#$b#No, that’s no good either! Ugh, what am I even doing?$s"/emote Mary 60/pause 500/emote Mary 16/jump Mary/faceDirection Mary 0/speak Mary "Oh! I’m very sorry, you didn’t overhear too much did you?$s"/quickQuestion #No, I must’ve just caught the tail end of it.#Yeah, you sounded like a real nutcase!(break)pause 500\speak Mary "Oh good. I’m glad I didn’t weird you out too much.$h"\emote farmer 40 (break)emote Mary 60\pause 500\speak Mary "Ah, I see. I am a bit of an oddball that way.$s"/pause 500/emote Mary 16/speak Mary "Well, as long as you’re here, mind helping me out with something?"/emote farmer 40/move farmer -2 0 2/move farmer 0 3 2/pause 500/speak Mary "I’m trying to write out a stage play that I’ve had buzzing in my head for years now. But every time I actually sit down to write, my mind blanks on me.#$b#I can’t even get the first words onto paper….$s"/faceDirection Mary 2/pause 500/speak Mary "Oh, well I suppose you can’t really help me without knowing what it’s about can you?$h#$b#The play is going to be about a young detective who finds out he has the ability to change people’s memories and…Well, honestly that’s all I have to work with right now.#$b#I know it’s vague, but I can feel a story so tantalizingly close!#$b#I’ve always wanted to be a playwright, ever since I saw Save the Homeland in Zuzu City with my mother when I was a little girl.$h#$b#Sometimes, I just don’t know if I’m cut out for it…$s"/emote farmer 60/pause 250/speak Mary "Hey, @? Would you mind stopping by and helping me out with my writing sometimes? I feel like having someone to bounce ideas off of will really help get the gears turning."/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Mary "Oh thank you so much!$h#$b#Okay, I’m going to get an introduction going for today. Thank you so much, @!$h"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end position 7 10 2

Entries.10270008/f Won 500/1000 2000: sadpiano/4 12/farmer 4 19 0 Harris 6 15 3 Won -30 -30 0/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 1/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/emote Harris 32/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp Won 4 19/speed Won 4/move Won 0 -2 0/emote Harris 16 true/emote farmer 16 true/faceDirection Harris 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 500/speak Won "Excuse me, @, but I have an urgent matter to take care of with the officer here. I should only be but a minute."/pause 500/move Won 1 0 0/jump Won/pause 500/speak Won "Have you heard from the governor yet?"/pause 500/emote Harris 28/pause 1000/speak Harris "Sorry Won, I actually meant to call you about that...I just got news.$s#$b#Looks like you won’t be able to get back home anytime soon I’m afraid...$s"/pause 500/shake Won 1000 true/speak Won "What? Why not?$s" true/pause 500/speak Harris "With the war going on, things are just too dangerous at the border.$s#$b#I’m sorry Won...but for your own safety we just can’t let you cross back over to Gotoro right now.$s"/pause 500/shake Won 2000 true/emote Won 12 true/pause 1000/speak Won "So I’m being held prisoner here, is that it?$a"/pause 2000/speak Harris "Won that’s not-$s"/pause 500/jump Won/speak Won "Fine, keep me here as long as you need then!$a"/pause 500/move Won -1 0 0/pause 500/speak Won "Better get out of town while you can, @, or else you might find yourself kept here against your wishes too!$a"/pause 500/speed Won 4/move Won 0 2 2/playSound doorClose/warp Won -30 -30/pause 1000 emote farmer 60/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 2000/speak Harris "Won...$s"/pause 1000/faceDirection Harris 3/speak Harris "I’m sorry, @, but now’s not a good time.$s"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end position 4 14
